00025 // we actually calculate the gradient of -Tcm !
00026 
00027 
00028 static void gob_P2(SlaterDet* Q,
00029                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00030                    const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX, 
00031                    complex double* p2, gradGaussian* dp2)
00032 {       
00033   int i;
00034   double M;
00035 
00036   M = 0.5/(Q->Z*mproton+Q->N*mneutron);
00037 
00038   *p2 -= M* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2) * X->Q;
00039 
00040   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00041     dp2->chi[i] -= M* X->T* dX->dS.chi[i]* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)* X->R;
00042   dp2->a -= M* X->T* X->S* ((3*dX->dlambda + dX->dpi2.a)* X->R +
00043                             (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)*dX->dR.a);
00044   for (i=0; i<3; i++)   
00045     dp2->b[i] -= M* X->T* X->S* (dX->dpi2.b[i]*X->R +
00046                                  (3*X->lambda + X->pi2)* dX->dR.b[i]);
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 static void gtb_P2(SlaterDet* Q,
00051                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00052                    const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00053                    const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00054                    const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00055                    complex double* p2, gradGaussian* dp2)
00056 {       
00057   int i;
00058   double M;
00059   complex double pipi;
00060 
00061   M = 0.5/(Q->Z*mproton+Q->N*mneutron);
00062 
00063   pipi = cvec3mult(X13->pi, X24->pi);
00064 
00065   *p2 -= 2*M* pipi* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00066 
00067   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00068     dp2->chi[i] -= 2*M* pipi* X13->T* dX13->dS.chi[i]* X13->R* X24->Q;
00069   dp2->a -= 2*M* (-X13->lambda*pipi* X13->R + pipi*dX13->dR.a)* 
00070     X13->T* X13->S* X24->Q;
00071   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00072     dp2->b[i] -= 2*M* (dX13->dpi.b*X24->pi[i]*X13->R + pipi* dX13->dR.b[i])* 
00073       X13->T* X13->S* X24->Q;
00074 }

00076 
00077 void calcgradTCM(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00078                  const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00079                  gradSlaterDet* dtcm)
00080 {
00081   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_P2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gob_P2};
00082   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_P2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gtb_P2};
00083 
00084 
00085   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_P2, dtcm);
00086   calcgradSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_tb_P2, dtcm);
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 void calcgradTCMod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00091                    const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00092                    const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00093                    gradSlaterDet* dtcm)
00094 {
00095   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_P2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gob_P2};
00096   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_P2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gtb_P2};
00097 
00098 
00099   calcgradSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, dX, &gop_ob_P2, dtcm);
00100   calcgradSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, dX, &gop_tb_P2, dtcm);
00101 }
